name: Vishal Harihar
about: I am a Manager - Tech@Lilly at the Global Data & Analytics team of Manufacturing Quality at Eli Lilly & Co. Completed MS in Applied Data Science from Luddy School of Informatics, Computing and Engg of Indiana University, Indianapolis (IUPUI). Previously worked as a Senior Associate for Annalect India, specializing in Media Analytics, Business Intelligence, Insight Tools & Dashboard Systems, Econometric Modeling, and Search.
